about.intro: This is an introduction on the about page

donate.intro: Support our mission of service and education

hero.headline: News :)
hero.byline: Keep informed with what happens at MACILE

prep_academy.page_description: MACILE Prop Academy is rigorous and challenging Saturday program to immerse students in a learning environment.

hero.headline: Prep Academy
hero.byline: A rigorous  and challenging weekend program to immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination.

items.headline: Immersive Learning
items.description: Immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination.

items.headline: Develop Reasoning
items.description: Improve analytical and logical reasoning and experimental and communication skills through problem-solving and exercises.

items.headline: Teamwork and Collaboration
items.description: Improve teamwork and peer collaboration, build good work ethics, and promote the virtue of perseverance.

items.headline: Digital Literacy
items.description: Increase the students’ technological literacy

items.headline: Strengthen Skill
items.description: Strengthen and further the students’ skills in mathematics, science, and Spanish

items.headline: STEM
items.description: Advance understanding of the engineering design process and the scientific method, infusing enthusiasm about engineering, mathematics, and science.

curriculum_section.headline: Prep Academy Curriculum
curriculum_section.byline: The MACILE curriculum development process is research-based. The main goal is to produce curricula that get young people excited about learning and build independent thinkers.

section_session.headline: An Experimental Success
section_session.byline: MACILE Prep Academy was devised as an experiment to aim to better students success through school year.

programs.page_description: Here we are going to present the programs of MACILE.

items.title: Summer Academy
items.description: A rigorous  and challenging summer program to immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination.
items.image_alt: A picture of students in 2014 MACILE Summer Academy

items.title: Preparatory School
items.description: A rigorous  and challenging summer program to immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination.
items.image_alt: Prep School programming class working on the new site

overview_section.intro: 100% Merit Based Scholarship provided to allow students to advance their learning at technical and preparatory schools in the Dominican Republic. We provide pre-college and university merit based scholarships to inspires students to advance their learning.

summer_academy.page_description: MACILE Summer Academy is rigorous and challenging summer program to immerse students in a learning environment.

hero.headline: Summer Academy
hero.byline: A rigorous  and challenging summer program to immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination

overview_section.intro: MACILE Summer Academy provides a friendly and respectful classroom atmosphere where students engage actively, think critically, and learn to work effectively in teams.

items.headline: Immersive Learning
items.description: Immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination.

items.headline: Develop Reasoning
items.description: Improve analytical and logical reasoning and experimental and communication skills through problem-solving and exercises.

items.headline: Teamwork and Collaboration
items.description: Improve teamwork and peer collaboration, build good work ethics, and promote the virtue of perseverance.

items.headline: Digital Literacy
items.description: Increase the students’ technological literacy

items.headline: Strengthen Skill
items.description: Strengthen and further the students’ skills in mathematics, science, and Spanish

items.headline: STEM
items.description: Advance understanding of the engineering design process and the scientific method, infusing enthusiasm about engineering, mathematics, and science.

curriculum_section.headline: Summer Academy Curriculum
curriculum_section.byline: The MACILE curriculum development process is research-based. The main goal is to produce curricula that get young people excited about learning and build independent thinkers.

section_session.headline: 10 years of developing creative minds
section_session.byline: MACILE Summer Academy has operated in Itabo-Nigua for 10 years. We’ve served over 500 students.

prep_academy.page_description: MACILE Prop Academy is rigorous and challenging Saturday program to immerse students in a learning environment.

hero.headline: Academia Preparatoria
hero.byline: A rigorous  and challenging weekend program to immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination.

section_overview.intro: MACILE Prep Academy provides a friendly and respectful classroom atmosphere where students engage actively in class discussion with peers, think critically, present their work, and learn to work effectively in teams.

items.headline: Immersive Learning
items.description: Immerse students in a learning environment that enlarges their thoughts and stimulates their creativity and imagination.

items.headline: Develop Reasoning
items.description: Improve analytical and logical reasoning and experimental and communication skills through problem-solving and exercises.

items.headline: Teamwork and Collaboration
items.description: Improve teamwork and peer collaboration, build good work ethics, and promote the virtue of perseverance.

items.headline: Digital Literacy
items.description: Increase the students’ technological literacy

items.headline: Strengthen Skill
items.description: Strengthen and further the students’ skills in mathematics, science, and Spanish

items.headline: STEM
items.description: Advance understanding of the engineering design process and the scientific method, infusing enthusiasm about engineering, mathematics, and science.

curriculum_section.headline: Prep Academy Curriculum
curriculum_section.byline: The MACILE curriculum development process is research-based. The main goal is to produce curricula that get young people excited about learning and build independent thinkers.

section_session.byline: MACILE Prep Academy was devised as an experiment to aim to better students success through school year.
